scripts.precommit: if git-branch-is release; then yarn -v; else yarn workspace @dnb/eufemia precommit && yarn workspace dnb-design-system-portal precommit; fi
scripts.reset: rm -rf ./node_modules && yarn workspace @dnb/eufemia reset && yarn workspace dnb-design-system-portal reset && yarn install
scripts.build: yarn workspace @dnb/eufemia build && yarn workspace dnb-design-system-portal build
scripts.build:ci: yarn workspace @dnb/eufemia prebuild:ci && yarn workspace @dnb/eufemia postbuild:ci && yarn workspace @dnb/eufemia publish:prepare
